headline: Is RTX (RTX) Pricing Still Justified After Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Gains?
summary: If you are wondering whether RTX is still reasonably priced after its recent run, this article will walk through what that current share price might imply about the stock's value. RTX shares recently closed at US$188.50, with returns of 0.7% over 7 days, 5.5% over 30 days, 0.7% year to date and 66.8% over the past year, along with 104.4% over 3 years and 205.5% over 5 years. Recent headlines around RTX have focused on broader interest in large U.S. industrial and defense related names, which...
